  • Method Details

    • uploadProfileImage

      @Multipart @POST("/users/{username}/profile-image") retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> uploadProfileImage(@Path("username") String username, @Part okhttp3.MultipartBody.Part image)

    • getUserJoinDate

      @GET("/users/joinDate/{email}/{password}") retrofit2.Call<String> getUserJoinDate(@Path(value="email",encoded=true) String email, @Path(value="password",encoded=true) String password)

    • deleteUser

      @DELETE("users/u/{username}") retrofit2.Call<Void> deleteUser(@Path("username") String username)

    • deleteProfileImage

      @GET("users/getName/{email}") retrofit2.Call<String> getName(@Path("email") String email)

    • getAllReports

      @GET("/adminUser/getAllReports/{email}") retrofit2.Call<Reports> getAllReports(@Path("email") String email, @Query("password") String password)
